html:
1.24.21  2:17 pm   do you think the philosophy from your videos should be taken seriously and/or applied?

      only if it's good

1.24.21  2:09 pm   Did you ever have a sad mad and bad glad dream?

      i must be having one now

1.24.21  1:58 pm   what does sadness sing in her song

      probably sings about happiness. at least that's what i would probably sing about if i was sadness

1.24.21  1:47 pm   hey bill, have u ever felt like u r losing motivations?

      no

1.24.21  1:46 pm   are you a princess?

      how did you know

1.24.21  1:38 pm   How do you obtain inspiration?

      i have a bucket to catch the inspiration but sometimes the bucket itself inspires me

1.24.21  1:38 pm   What's your favorite song that you've made so far?

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

1.24.21  12:49 pm   When you made the might quit video, did you not believe you would eventually make another song like here comes the sun?

      i'm going to make thousands of songs. i've always known this. at the time of "might quit", i was under the assumption that i was about to figure out how to do 1 video per week instead of 1 every 2 weeks or more

1.24.21  12:32 pm   i have been making music as a hobby since March last year, and I frequently find myself getting attached to the verse chorus verse chorus bridge chorus structure. i have tried really hard to do something different because i am getting really bored of it. whenever i do something different, i'm just not happy with the results. either that, or i get stuck in nowhere. any ideas on how to overcome this?

     check all the songs you listen to. see if any of them do something besides that form. See if there are any songs you really really like, that don't follow that form. figure out what it does instead. figure out what you want to call that. Just check out all the songs you know and see what kind of roadmap they're using. Just take some time and enjoy some different road maps. eventually they will all come out in your writing

      also, i dont know a lot of music theory. do you think spending time on learning music theory could help? thanks!

      if you've been making music, then you are the one with the theories. Maybe it's time for you to teach those theories.......

1.24.21  11:58 am   Why did you stop making videos on Youtube after "might quit"?

      i screwed up. i thought i could make an entire video in 3D. i couldn't. then i started learning how. then i realized i may never know how. so then i made one anyway, without necessarily knowing how

1.24.21  11:38 am   what are the chords at here comes the sun at 3:00 for the "hawaiian" style music part?

      everything between 2:17 and 3:04 is Bbmaj9, F9sus4

1.24.21  11:11 am   Bill, this isn't a question, but I just wanted to tell you how much I enjoy your incredible music! You're a great musician!

      holy smokes you are very friendly

1.24.21  10:56 am   What do you think about when you make the songs? (In a good way)

      i try to think about the whole world, everything else besides the song. this may seem counter intuitive, but for worldly songs this is what you gotta do

1.24.21  11:40 am   Are you going to continue making videos?

      yes

1.24.21  8:23 am   did you just put random words to do your lyrics

     no

     or you have a very deep thinking process behind

     deep feeling is usually more effective than deep thinking. But if it's done right, ideally it will cause deep thinking, after

     because i was hit by a nuclear molecule and now a have no deep thinking about things except your lyrics and i want to know if a can do a longer question so i continue to write everything that i think of like knife or bunny or when did i

1.24.21  7:17 am   Any news on London Bridge?

      it's still up

1.24.21  6:10 am   are you working on a video?

      yes

1.24.21  6:06 am   why did you decide to upload now, and not in December or something.

     because the video i was working on was not done in december

     or was there no thought behind it?

1.24.21  5:43 am   i know you dislike capital letters

     you don't know that, in fact you are wrong about that

      but caps lock or shift?

      that depends how long you want the effect to last

1.24.21  4:50 am   prove yourself that you are a miracle in this world

      none of us have to. but we all do anyway

1.24.21  4:02 am   someone on youtube said you had panic attacks during your hiatus based on a reddit post, is thay true or false?

      only if someone mentions the word 'hiatus'. that sounds like some sort of terminal disease, which i wouldn't wish upon even my worst enemies

1.24.21  2:28 am   How did you figure out you were normal?

      went crazy

1.24.21  1:54 am   is there a warning as to when the sun will come? or does it just happen randomly?

      should be about every 24 hours. unless you are traveling longitudinally at a high rate of speed

1.24.21  12:47 am   in your "here comes the sun" video during the ufo tambourine light show part just after the river boat ride I noticed that one window on a building has 5 sides. What is the meaning of this 5-sided window?

      decoration

1.24.21  12:47 am   whats inside the "fragile box"?

      a very strong box

1.24.21  12:25 am   hey there! i think i do pretty well at writing emotionally led harmony but struggle with melodies and such

is there any advice/do you have any tips you could share to help with marrying these two?

P.S. big fan thanks for everything you do!

      it might be time to see if you can throw words into the equation, somehow

1.24.21  12:22 am   at some point, please render one of your blender projects as a 3D 180 degree vr video (eevee right?. i won't be satisfied until im completely immersed in your imagination.

      180 vr is not going to help you be immersed in my imagination. That would be a way to ensure that you would be statistically be about 40% immersed in my imagination, on average, at any point during the video. Because there would be approximately 40% chance that you would be looking at the same thing that i would choose to be looking at, at any particular time

1.23.21  11:40 pm   Do you think about how a video is going to look like when you're writing the music for it?

      sometimes

1.23.21  11:09 pm   What would you describe your music as? Personally I think it's a mix of pop, jazz, and bossa nova, but what about you?

      the whole reason i got into making music is so i don't have to describe it

1.23.21  10:49 pm   when was the last time you used a period

      about 20 seconds ago

1.23.21  10:47 pm   What do you think mostly abouT?

      getting on that next big trend, and staying marketable to key demographics. just kidding, i think about mostly walls & doors

1.23.21  9:39 pm   have they invented syrupless pancakes yet bill

      you might have to do it

1.23.21  9:17 pm   why dod you choose one of your longer songs to animate for?

     that's a coincidence. i painstakingly made sure to pick which one i would most prefer to record next. this is usually a very difficult decision to make. but length was not a factor

     did you know it was gonna be hard to do and you just did it anyway?

     i knew the production process would have trillions of unknowns in it

1.23.21  9:15 pm   how long does it usually take to make one of your music videos in final cut?

      i had it down to about 2 weeks toward the end there

1.23.21  9:11 pm   when did you stopped chasing for perfection?

      as soon as i realized it's nothing

1.23.21  9:00 pm   what was the meaning behind "here comes the sun"? 

      ever had a bad time? well i have great news, the sun still exists and you will likely see it tomorrow morning

1.23.21  8:43 pm   How's the next video?

      pretty good

1.23.21  8:33 pm   How did you predict 2020 with "just did a bad thing"

      i actually was trying to predict december 18, 2018

1.23.21  8:10 pm   if you can't accomplish a weekly schedule, would you opt for a monthly one instead?

      sure, if i am in the mood to opt for failure

1.23.21  8:02 pm   When you posted Might Quit did you plan the that you were about to go on break,

     no, the plan was to start releasing videos twice as fast

     and was the song hinting at the fact the we're gonna be gone for a while. 

     no. that song was written based on that verse melody. i was literally just trying to find what words fit best for that melody, to make the strongest song i could out of that melody

1.23.21  7:28 pm   is "it doesn't wait now either" the point at which you started rewriting the song? since you said you reduced the length of it, and also, i feel like it changes after that and is as advanced as your newer work.

      everything after "no stranger to fallin in love" is august 2020.
     some replacements also made in august 2020:
          'lay about' was changed from a different, similar phrase
          'having a conversation, and wondering who we're talking to' was changed from 'slowly, wondering what we're gonna do'
          'and sadness wonders what we're gonna do' was changed from 'and sadness tells us what we're gonna do'
          'and sadness comes to sing a song for you' was changed from 'and sadness tells us what we're gonna do'
          "[vocal riff] when darkness covers the earth [vocal riff] and i know it's the end for sure" had its lyric and melody changed from "oh when the rain falls down, oh when the rain falls down"
          'the buildings wonder if they'll ever be built' was changed from 'the railroad comes and says you can't come through'
          in the second chorus, 'blazing amazing miracle sun....still we'll blaze' was changed from being identical to the first chorus
     
     the entire second verse is 2012 (except for the buildings line)
      the entire bridge up to "no stranger to fallin in love" is 2012
      the entire chorus (EXCEPT the first title line) is 2012
     this much is 2010

1.23.21  7:18 pm   How did you learn singing?

      by singing

1.23.21  6:45 pm   What's your creative process

      throw spaghetti all over the wall and ceiling

1.23.21  6:25 pm   what did you do in "just did a bad thing"?

      attempted to add non-songs into the 2 week song schedule without reducing the song schedule, and in the process failed at adding the non-song and failed at not ruining the 2 week song schedule

1.23.21  5:53 pm   why do you say you're normal when you are actually very extraordinary?

      keep my options open

1.23.21  5:43 pm   Do you think that you have a good grammar?

     yes. also sometimes i take creative license, which i also think is good

      I don't think I've ever seen a spelling mistake by you that isn't on purpose

      i guess you've never seen me try to spell 'algorhythm'

1.23.21  5:39 pm   When I listen to your music I feel vibes and I don't really try to understand it just comes naturally , how do you accomplish this ?

      perhaps you accomplished it. reading your question more closely, perhaps nature accomplished it

1.23.21  5:27 pm   How long did here come the sun final video take to export?

      about 2 minutes

1.23.21  5:06 pm   Has the postman brought news yet?

      the post man brings multiple things, and you're supposed to guess which one's the news

1.23.21  4:17 pm   do you like making music?

      yes
